entries.description: Created initial ai-agent directory structure (core, services, data, config); Set up basic configuration management
Implemented Azure OpenAI client with rate limiting; Added token and request limiting mechanisms
Created meeting analysis prompt templates; Implemented retry mechanisms with exponential backoff
Set up core engine structure; Added basic request/response handling for OpenAI
Implemented meeting service base functionality; Added Microsoft Graph API integration
Created task service for Intervals integration; Added task matching algorithms
Implemented time entry service; Added duration calculation utilities
Created storage service for AI results; Implemented data persistence layer
Added review service for meeting analysis; Implemented confidence score calculation
Created service integration interfaces; Added type definitions for API responses
Implemented meeting data preprocessing; Added attendance record analysis
Created task matching validation; Added match confidence scoring
Implemented time entry validation; Added duplicate prevention mechanisms
Enhanced meeting analysis prompts; Added context management for better results
Created storage backup mechanisms; Added data recovery procedures
Implemented error handling for API calls; Added service level error recovery
Created logging system for AI operations; Added debug information collection
Implemented performance monitoring; Added response time tracking
Created test suites for AI components; Added validation for AI responses
Implemented batch processing for meetings; Added queue management system
Created dashboard components for AI status; Added real-time monitoring UI
Implemented health check system; Added service status monitoring
Created automated backup procedures; Added data integrity checks
Implemented system alerts; Added notification system for errors
Created deployment scripts; Added environment configuration
Implemented production safeguards; Added rate limiting for production
Created system documentation; Added API endpoint documentation
Conducted final testing; Deployed to production environment
